WITH data_flow_created_by AS ( SELECT s.id, s.category_id, s.name, s.avatar, s.description, s.created_by, u.fullname AS 'created_fullname', u.avatar AS 'created_avatar' FROM subject s INNER JOIN users u ON s.created_by = u.id WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 AND u.delete_flag = 0 ), data_flow_last_modifed_by AS ( SELECT s.id, s.category_id, s.name, s.avatar, s.description, s.last_modified_by, u.fullname AS 'last_modified_fullname', u.avatar AS 'last_modified_avatar' FROM subject s INNER JOIN users u ON s.last_modified_by = u.id WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 AND u.delete_flag = 0 ) SELECT COUNT(1) FROM data_flow_created_by data_1 INNER JOIN data_flow_last_modifed_by data_2 ON data_1.id = data_2.id
WHERE (data_1.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR data_1.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
SELECT s.id, s.name, s.avatar, s.description, s.study_form, s.study_place FROM subject s WHERE s.active_flag = 1 AND s.delete_flag = 0 AND s.id = #{id};

SELECT count(1) FROM users u inner join roles r on u.role_id = r.id inner join user_subject_relation s on u.id = s.user_id WHERE s.active_flag = 1 AND s.delete_flag = 0 AND s.id = #{id} AND r.name = #{role}
SELECT sc.session, sc.time_detail FROM schedule sc inner join subject_schedule_relation s on s.schedule_id = sc.id WHERE s.active_flag = 1 AND s.delete_flag = 0 AND s.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET `name` = #{item.name}, avatar = #{item.avatar}, description = #{item.description}, study_form = #{item.studyForm}, study_place = #{item.studyPlace}, last_modified_date = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), last_modified_by = #{item.lastModifiedBy} WHERE id = #{item.id};
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.avatar, s.description FROM subject s WHERE s.active_flag = 1 AND s.delete_flag = 0 AND s.name = #{name};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject(`name`, avatar, description, category_id, study_form, study_place, delete_flag, active_flag, created_date, created_by, last_modified_date, last_modified_by) VALUES (#{item.name}, #{item.avatar}, #{item.description}, #{item.categoryId}, #{item.studyForm}, #{item.studyPlace}, b'0', b'1', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), #{item.createdBy}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), #{item.lastModifiedBy})
